title: Age of Mythology: Retold Update 18.27100
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!

title: Age of Empires IV – Patch 13.2.4553
description: Hello once again, Age of Empires IV fans! We’re back at it with another Season Ten patch that we’re excited to roll out. We appreciate your feedback and requests tremendously and are squashing a few pesky bugs that made their way into our latest patches. Plus, we’re rolling out our newest Seasonal Event, so read … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 143421
description: Welcome to another exciting update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – including fixes for medals and Rocket Carts, plus the newest DLC, The Three Kingdoms, is officially available on Steam, Microsoft Store, Xbox, and PlayStation 5!
